about_the_game:
Customize your character:

Choose your character's background, choose your talent, assign attribute points, build your character's advantage, is a hundred steps through the sharpshooter, or the mighty strongman, or the swift raider, everything is up to you.

Arm your character:

Rich equipment system, each piece of equipment has visual changes, and has different parts of the protective effect, please do a good job of protection, to meet the deadly attack of zombies.

Modify your weapon:

With a variety of basic firearms and melee weapons, you can modify and maintain your weapons, and good marauders need to maintain their weapons regularly.

Explore restricted areas full of danger:

Houses, apartments, police stations, supermarkets, different scenes will have different material distribution, and contains some secrets, according to the needs of the plan your route of action, and safe evacuation.

Run your base:

Gather supplies to expand and upgrade your camp, build workstations, planter boxes, hunting grounds, water purifiers and other facilities, and get the essentials for survival. Make tools to help you survive on this dangerous island.

For feedback and suggestions:

The game is currently in the early access stage, and there are still some functions and capabilities in our plan that have not been developed yet. At present, there are only two people in the team, and we need about two years to complete the development of the official version. Please give us feedback and help, so that we can complete the development of the complete version together.For more questions about early access, please read the "Early Access Game" section on the header. Thank you for your support.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: 《Death Plunder-亡命掠夺者》is a 2D pixel platen survival game,You'll play as a mortal who risks everything for a treasure,Deep into the quarantined zombie island,plunder all kinds of loot and supplies To ensure survival.
